org.apache.spark.sql.execution

Class PythonUDF

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.trees.TreeNode<org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions.Expression>
      • org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions.Expression
        • org.apache.spark.sql.execution.PythonUDF
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Logging, scala.Equals, scala.Product

    public class PythonUDF
extends org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.expressions.Expression
implements Logging, scala.Product, scala.Serializable
    A serialized version of a Python lambda function. Suitable for use in a PythonRDD.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
